summary: YouTube Kids is a video app and website designed for children, offering a safer way to explore online content. It provides a kid-friendly version of YouTube with selected videos, parental controls, and filters to block inappropriate content for those under 13 years old. Available on various devices, it was launched in 2015 and has faced criticism for advertising and suggesting potentially unsuitable videos. In response, YouTube has promised better filtering to ensure a safer experience for young users.
title: YouTube Kids
